channel.title: [RS2] [SRL] [DIVI] IP-owerCutter
channel.description:
[b][center][size=15pt]Powercutter[/size][/b] [b][size=13pt]By IP-Drowner[/size][/center][/b]
This is the first release of my PowerCutter. It uses SRL 3.81 and earlier builds.
Forms will be coming soon as i still need to learn them. But i do not think that forms are needed in this script.
I am a beginner and this is my first RS Script.
Any bugs, please report immediantely on this post. I have included a manual inside the RAR file as a beginners guide to setting up this script and for SCAR.
Post proggies please.
I have tested this and it works perfectly for me. Gained 6 levels using it.
EDIT: You can now download the seperate files. Manual.txt and PowerChopper.scar.
EDIT: Please re-download as a new patch has been made. I forgot to add axe detection in the first script and detection to the trees that break your axe.
Enjoy~

item.title: [RS2] [SRL] [DIVI] IP-owerCutter
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“SMASH, post:9, topic:123089”]Failed when compiling
Line 42: [Error] (14856:1): Duplicate identifier ‘’ in script C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\PowerCutter.scar

ehh ;([/quote]
Yes, that is a bug that i cannot quite figure out. I will look into the script more now that i have more free time.

Sorry for not being able to reply for a long time on these replies but i have been husy and unavailable. I will try and release another script build.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32”]Failed when compiling
Line 41: [Error] (18082:1): Duplicate identifier ‘’ in script C:\DOCUME~1\AKIS\LOCALS~1\TEMP\PowerCutter-1.scar

whats that?? did not work…[/quote]
Hmmm. I do not know what that problem is in fact.

Try this, remove the ‘’ where your username and password is and try the script. Does it work?

item.title: [RS2] [SRL] [DIVI] IP-owerCutter
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“killer jcd, post:6, topic:123089”]Failed when compiling
Line 67: [Error] (67:1): Unknown identifier ‘GameTab’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.11\includes\SRL\SRL\Core\Inventory.scar
help please[/quote]
Which SRL Version are you using? As it supports SRL 3.81.
